name: Escape - Fear Ship
description:
My name is Emily and I need your help!

Are you ready for adventures? If so, you will definitely like the game Escape Emily! It is full of puzzles, quests, labyrinths and horror. You are going to fight for a girl called Emily, who has been kidnapped by the evil pirate and is hidden at the Ghost Ship.
Gorgeous graphics, exciting brain teasers, inventive plot.
Take a guess, prove that you are the cleverest and bravest one – download the quest and off you go, adventure await!
This is a popular and thrilling brainteaser in the style of Escape. You will definitely like it!
